Feats-Skill-Society -- Female Half-Elf Bard: 2
Strength: 12 (+1) Dexterity: 12 (+1) Constitution: 14 (+2) Intelligence: 14 (+2) Wisdom: 12 (+1) Charisma: 14 (+2)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)
Experience: 1500/2000 Level: 2 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 6/11
Ability Notes: Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 1; Class: 2; Skill: 1 Selectable Feature Count: Bard (Muse); Human (Heritage)
Feats: Connections; Cooperative Nature; Courtly Graces; Legendary Codebreaker; Legendary Linguist; Multifarious Muse (Enigma Muse); Multilingual; Reach Spell; Read Lips; Sign Language; Streetwise Bard Features: Ability Boost (Charisma); Ability Boosts; Attack Trained (Simple Weapons; Longsword; Rapier; Sap; Shortbow; Shortsword; Whip; Unarmed Attacks); Bard Feats; Bard Skills; Composition Spells; Defense Trained (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense); Muse; Occult Spellcasting; Perception Expert; Polymath Muse; Save Expert (Will); Save Trained (Fortitude; Reflex); Skill Feats; Spell Trained (Occult) Acolyte Features: Ability Boost (Choose 1 from Intelligence, Wisdom; Choose 1 from any); Skill Trained (Religion; Scribing Lore); Student Of The Canon Human Features: Ability Boost (Choose 2 from any); Ancestry Feats; Half-Elf; Human Heritage
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: Ancestry Feat (Choose 1 from any)
Bard Feats: Class Feat (Choose 1 from any)
Half-Elf: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Multifarious Muse (Enigma Muse): Class Feat (Choose 1 from any Enigma Muse)
Muse: 1 selection
Polymath Muse: Has the Versatile Performance feature
Skill Feats: Skill Feat (Choose 1 from any)
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Half-Elf: Has the elf trait and can take elf and half-elf feats
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Multifarious Muse (Enigma Muse): Can select enigma muse feats
Perception: +7 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +1 (dexterity; untrained) Folktale Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +5 (wisdom; trained)
Arcana: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Herbalism Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Scribing Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained)
Athletics: +5 (strength; trained) Intimidation: +2 (charisma; untrained) Society: +8 (intelligence; expert)
Crafting: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Medicine: +1 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +1 (dexterity; untrained)
Deception: +2 (charisma; untrained) Nature: +1 (wisdom; untrained) Survival: +1 (wisdom; untrained)
Demon Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Occultism: +6 (intelligence; trained) Thievery: +1 (dexterity; untrained)
Diplomacy: +2 (charisma; untrained) Performance: +6 (charisma; trained)
Languages: Abyssal; Celestial; Common; Draconic; Elven; Goblin
Skill Notes:
Bard Skills: Skill Trained (Occultism; Performance; Choose 6 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Multilingual: +2 Language Count
Connections: Can use Society to gain a meeting with an important figure or to exchange favors
Courtly Graces: Can use Society to impersonate a noble or to Make An Impression on one
Legendary Codebreaker: Can use Society to Decipher Writing at full Speed, and successes at normal Speed are critical successes
Legendary Linguist: Can establish basic communication with any creature that uses language
Read Lips: Can read the lips of those who can be seen clearly; in difficult circumstances, this requires a Society check and can inflict fascinated and flat-footed on self
Sign Language: Knows the sign equivalents of understood languages
Streetwise: Can use Society to Gather Information and to Recall Knowledge in familiar settlements
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Versatile Performance: Can use Performance in place of Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation to Impersonate, Make An Impression, Demoralize, or to satisfy prerequisites
Combat
Hit Points: 28 Armor Class: 15 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +5 (dexterity; trained); Will: +7 (wisdom; expert)
Magic
Spell Slots: O1: 3; OC1: 5 Focus Points: 1 Attack: Occult: +6 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Occult: 16 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Counter Performance (O1 Foc Enc): (R) Allies in a 60' emanation can substitute a self Performance roll for a save vs. the triggering auditory or visual effect
Inspire Courage (OC1 Foc Enc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Unseen Servant (O1 Con): (3) R60' Invisible servant with 4 Hit Points and a 30' fly Speed obeys commands to move and manipulate objects while sustained or until reduced to 0 Hit Points
Magic Notes:
Composition Spells: Knows the Counter Performance and Inspire Courage occult spells/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Polymath Muse: Knows the Unseen Servant occult spell
Occult Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Notes
Validation Errors:
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 1 available vs. 8 allocated
Legendary Codebreaker Feat: Requires level (currently 2) >= 15 and society rank (currently 2) >= 4
Legendary Linguist Feat: Requires level (currently 2) >= 15, society rank (currently 2) >= 4 and multilingual feature (currently 1)
